verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus
Holy one
Gods precious Son You gave

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus
On the cross
You took my shame
Forever from my heart I'll say

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I live to worship You, Lord
My King of glory
Brought me to life
Gave me wings to fly
You are holy
Heaven and earth declare You praise
Both now and evermore
I glorify Your name

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus, Jesus
On the cross
You took my sin
Forever from my heart I'll sing
